author: CT Phipps
description:
Alone in the Dark is one of the seminal video games in the survival horror genre and the originator of the genre in 3D. It predates Resident Evil, for example, by four years. The franchise has had its ups and downs since then with the lowest point probably being an Uwe Boll adaptation that had […]

The post REVIEW: Alone in the Dark (2024) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Alone in the Dark (2024)
